Name: Smoke of Scotland
Ingredients: 60 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
5 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist (flamed).
Review: Smoky, with floral and tropical fruit notes from the elderflower liqueur and added complexity from the vermouth and Cynar.
History: Created in 2007 by Vincenzo Marianella at Providence, Los Angeles, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Smoke of Scotland contains 197 calories
